page.title: 11A day in the life of...
page.content: When I get up in the morning I go downstairs and make my breakfast and switch the television on and then watch Popeye.I go upstairs and get dressed then I brush my hair and go to school with my sister and we meet Lisa's friend at the Coop and when we get to school I play a little while with my friends.On Wednesdays we have hymn practice first thing and we sing songs and Miss Simpson tells us a story.Then we go back to our class and do our work.When it is dinner-time we have our dinner and then our pudding and then go out to play. In the afternoon we do our work and sometimes we play rounders and have stories. After school we go home and play out and sometimes we go for a walk with the dog down by the River Don and we pass St.Oswald's church on the way there.
